# Preset variables:
# None.


# The code:
lyric <- "I like to eat apples and bananas"
intro <- substr(lyric,1,13)
fruits <- substr(lyric,15,nchar(lyric))
fruits_e <- gsub("a","ee", fruits)
fruits_o <- gsub("a","o", fruits)
lyric_e <- paste(intro, fruits_e)
#print(fruits_e)
#print(paste(intro, fruits_o))
